description: Main entry point and root widget for a Flutter note-taking app. It initializes database, repository, and provider setup, and builds the MaterialApp with theme and home screen.

classes.name: NotesApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, responsible for providing repository and state management to the widget tree.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main function that initializes Flutter widgets, sets up database and repository, and runs the application.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the NotesApp, setting up providers and the MaterialApp widget.
